description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期秦国君主，在位长达56年。他以任用名臣、富国强兵而著称，其统治为秦始皇统一六国奠定了坚实基础。
description.en: A monarch of the state of Qin during the Warring States period of China, who reigned for 56 years. He was known for appointing capable ministers, enriching the state, and strengthening the military, laying a solid foundation for the unification of China by his great-grandson, Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，秦昭襄王之父。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Qin, father of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦惠文王之妾，秦昭襄王之母。秦昭襄王即位初期曾代为摄政。
description.en: A consort of King Huiwen of Qin and the mother of King Zhaoxiang of Qin. She served as regent during the early years of King Zhaoxiang's reign.

description.zh-cn: 秦国君主，秦昭襄王之兄。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Qin, elder brother of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王的正妻。
description.en: The principal wife of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王之妾，秦孝文王之母。
description.en: A consort of King Zhaoxiang of Qin and the mother of King Xiaowen of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王之子，其继任者。
description.en: Son and successor of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国大臣，宣太后之弟。在秦昭襄王时期手握重权。
description.en: A minister of the State of Qin and the younger brother of Queen Dowager Xuan. He held significant power during the reign of King Zhaoxiang.

description.zh-cn: 秦国丞相，向秦昭襄王献“远交近攻”之策。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Qin who proposed the strategy of 'allying with distant states while attacking nearby ones' to King Zhaoxiang.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，战国四名将之一，以在长平之战中大败赵军而闻名。
description.en: A general of the State of Qin, one of the Four Greatest Generals of the Warring States period, famous for defeating the Zhao army in the Battle of Changping.

description.zh-cn: 中国首位皇帝，秦昭襄王的曾孙。
description.en: The first emperor of China and the great-grandson of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国周朝时期的诸侯国，后发展为统一中国的秦朝。
description.en: A vassal state during the Zhou dynasty in ancient China, which later became the Qin dynasty that unified China.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期赵国君主，曾协助迎立秦昭襄王。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Zhao during the Warring States period, who assisted in the enthronement of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国大臣，曾为秦昭襄王处理政务，后出奔齐国。
description.en: A minister of the State of Qin who once handled state affairs for King Zhaoxiang, but later fled to the State of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 秦惠文王之子，秦昭襄王之兄弟。因争夺王位失败而发动叛乱，后被镇压。
description.en: A son of King Huiwen of Qin and a brother of King Zhaoxiang. He launched a rebellion after failing to secure the throne, which was subsequently suppressed.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期楚国君主，被秦昭襄王诱骗至秦国并扣留，最终客死于秦。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Chu during the Warring States period. He was tricked into going to Qin by King Zhaoxiang, detained, and eventually died there.

description.zh-cn: 秦国将领，曾奉秦昭襄王之命平定蜀地叛乱。
description.en: A general of the State of Qin who was ordered by King Zhaoxiang to suppress a rebellion in the Shu region.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王之弟，被封为蜀侯，后反叛秦国。
description.en: Younger brother of King Zhaoxiang of Qin, enfeoffed as the Marquis of Shu, who later rebelled against Qin.

description.zh-cn: 齐国贵族及政治家，曾短暂担任秦国宰相，后逃离秦国并联合韩、魏攻秦。
description.en: A nobleman and statesman from the State of Qi who briefly served as Chancellor of Qin before escaping and leading an alliance with Han and Wei against Qin.

description.zh-cn: 由齐国孟尝君联合韩国、魏国攻打秦国的一场战役，联军攻破了函谷关。
description.en: A battle initiated by Lord Mengchang of Qi in alliance with Han and Wei against the State of Qin, resulting in the breach of Hangu Pass by the allied forces.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期齐国君主。曾拒绝秦昭襄王的“东帝”尊号，并组织合纵攻秦。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Qi during the Warring States period. He refused the title of 'Eastern Emperor' from King Zhaoxiang of Qin and organized an alliance to attack Qin.

description.zh-cn: 赵国大臣，以“完璧归赵”的事迹闻名，成功阻止秦昭襄王骗取和氏璧。
description.en: A minister of the State of Zhao, famous for the story of 'returning the jade intact to Zhao,' in which he successfully thwarted King Zhaoxiang's attempt to deceitfully acquire the He Shi Bi jade.

description.zh-cn: 秦国与赵国之间的一场决定性战役，秦军在白起的指挥下大胜，对赵国造成了毁灭性打击。
description.en: A decisive battle between the states of Qin and Zhao. The Qin army, under the command of Bai Qi, won a major victory, dealing a devastating blow to Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的主要诸侯国之一。
description.en: One of the major vassal states during the Warring States period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上周朝的后半部分，于前256年被秦国所灭。
description.en: The latter part of the Zhou dynasty in Chinese history, which was annexed by the State of Qin in 256 BC.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期位于中原的小国，于前255年被秦国所灭。
description.en: A small state in the Central Plains during the Warring States period, annexed by the State of Qin in 255 BC.

description.zh-cn: 秦国发动的一系列旨在消灭其他六个主要诸侯国、统一中国的战争。
description.en: A series of military campaigns launched by the State of Qin to eliminate the other six major states and unify China.

description.zh-cn: 楚国君主，曾娶秦昭襄王之女。
description.en: Monarch of the State of Chu, who married a daughter of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国公子，秦昭襄王的外孙，其母为嫁给楚考烈王的秦国公主。
description.en: A prince of the State of Qin, grandson of King Zhaoxiang. His mother was a Qin princess who married King Kaolie of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 昌平君是秦昭襄王的外孙。
description.en: Lord Changping was the maternal grandson of King Zhaoxiang of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 与魏冉合谋，将当时在燕国为质的公子稷迎立为秦王。
description.en: Conspired with Wei Ran to install Prince Ji, who was a hostage in the State of Yan, as the King of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 在秦武王死后诸公子争位时，支持并成功拥立异母弟公子稷为王。
description.en: After the death of King Wu of Qin, during the succession struggle among the princes, he supported and successfully enthroned his half-brother Prince Ji.

description.zh-cn: 因秦昭襄王年幼即位，宣太后以太后之位代为摄政，掌握实权。
description.en: As King Zhaoxiang ascended the throne at a young age, Queen Dowager Xuan acted as regent and held the actual power.

description.zh-cn: 在秦昭襄王继位初期协助处理政务，后因遭排挤出奔齐国。
description.en: Assisted in managing state affairs during the early reign of King Zhaoxiang but later fled to the State of Qi due to political ostracism.

description.zh-cn: 在与秦昭襄王的继位者争执中失败后，集结反对势力发动叛乱。
description.en: After losing the succession struggle against King Zhaoxiang, he gathered opposition forces and launched a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 镇压了公子壮发动的叛乱。
description.en: Suppressed the rebellion launched by Prince Zhuang.

description.zh-cn: 将会盟的楚怀王扣留软禁，并逼迫其割地，楚怀王拒绝后被长期囚禁直至去世。
description.en: Detained and placed King Huai of Chu under house arrest during a meeting, attempting to force him to cede territory. After King Huai's refusal, he was imprisoned until his death.

description.zh-cn: 奉秦昭襄王之命，平定了蜀侯公子恽的叛乱。
description.en: Under the order of King Zhaoxiang of Qin, he suppressed the rebellion of Prince Yun, the Marquis of Shu.

description.zh-cn: 因听信谗言，将孟尝君囚禁并准备杀害他。
description.en: Heeding slanderous advice, he imprisoned Lord Mengchang and intended to execute him.

description.zh-cn: 齐、韩、魏联军在此次战役中击败了秦军。
description.en: The allied forces of Qi, Han, and Wei defeated the Qin army in this battle.

description.zh-cn: 逃回齐国成为宰相后，联合韩国、魏国发动了对秦国的战争。
description.en: After escaping back to Qi and becoming its chancellor, he formed an alliance with Han and Wei to launch a war against Qin.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝了秦昭襄王互尊为帝的提议，并联合六国诸侯合纵攻打秦国。
description.en: Rejected King Zhaoxiang's proposal for mutual recognition as emperors and organized a vertical alliance of six states to attack Qin.

description.zh-cn: 在秦昭襄王试图以十五座城池为诱饵骗取和氏璧时，蔺相如凭借智谋和勇气，成功将璧玉完整带回赵国。
description.en: When King Zhaoxiang of Qin attempted to deceitfully acquire the He Shi Bi jade by offering fifteen cities, Lin Xiangru, with his wisdom and courage, successfully brought the jade back to Zhao intact.

description.zh-cn: 采纳范雎的建议，废除宣太后的权力，让她退居后宫。
description.en: Adopting Fan Ju's advice, he stripped Queen Dowager Xuan of her power and had her retire to the inner palace.

description.zh-cn: 采纳范雎的建议，罢免了魏冉的相邦职务，并将其逐出咸阳。
description.en: Adopting Fan Ju's advice, he dismissed Wei Ran from his position as chancellor and expelled him from Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 秦国在此战中重创赵国主力，极大削弱了赵国的国力。
description.en: The State of Qin inflicted a heavy blow on the main forces of Zhao in this battle, greatly weakening Zhao's national strength.

description.zh-cn: 作为秦军主将，秘密替换王龁指挥作战，并最终取得决定性胜利。
description.en: As the commander of the Qin army, he secretly replaced Wang He to direct the battle and ultimately achieved a decisive victory.

description.zh-cn: 长平之战后，认为秦军应休养生息，劝说秦昭襄王与赵国议和，阻止了白起乘胜灭赵的计划。
description.en: After the Battle of Changping, believing the Qin army needed rest, he persuaded King Zhaoxiang to make peace with Zhao, thus thwarting Bai Qi's plan to annihilate Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 因白起不肯领命出征，加上范雎的进言，秦昭襄王派使者赐剑命白起自刎。
description.en: Due to Bai Qi's refusal to lead a campaign and influenced by Fan Ju's words, King Zhaoxiang sent an envoy with a sword, ordering Bai Qi to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 秦国攻打并灭亡了东周王室。
description.en: The State of Qin attacked and annihilated the Eastern Zhou royal house.

description.zh-cn: 秦国灭亡了西周公国。
description.en: The State of Qin annexed the statelet of Western Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王数十年的统治，通过治军备战和富国强兵，为其曾孙秦始皇最终统一天下奠定了基础。
description.en: King Zhaoxiang's decades-long reign, through military preparation and strengthening the state, laid the foundation for his great-grandson Qin Shi Huang to eventually unify China.

description.zh-cn: 秦昭襄王时期的持续扩张和国力增强，为后来的秦灭六国之战创造了先决条件。
description.en: The continuous expansion and strengthening of national power during King Zhaoxiang's reign created the preconditions for the subsequent Qin's wars of unification.
